fallWinter.title: Full Lawn Leaf Removal
fallWinter.desc: Let’s keep your yard feeling cozy and clean! I’ll carefully remove fallen leaves so your outdoor space stays tidy, inviting, and ready to enjoy.

fallWinter.title: Snow Removal
fallWinter.desc: Let’s keep your home safe and cozy this winter! I’ll clear snow with care so your driveway and walkways stay clean, easy to use, and welcoming for everyone who visits.

fallWinter.title: Seasonal Contracts
fallWinter.desc: Enjoy peace of mind all season long! I offer flexible daily and weekly service plans for fall and winter, making sure leaves are cleared and snow is handled before it becomes a hassle. Your outdoor space stays clean, safe, and welcoming—no matter the weather.

springSummer.title: Lawn Mowing & Maintenance
springSummer.desc: Keep your lawn green, neat, and healthy! I’ll mow, edge, and maintain your yard so it’s ready for summer fun and relaxation.

springSummer.title: Garden Care & Weeding
springSummer.desc: Your garden deserves attention! I’ll remove weeds, trim plants, and ensure your flowers and shrubs flourish all season long.

springSummer.title: Seasonal Contracts
springSummer.desc: Enjoy peace of mind all season long! I offer flexible weekly and monthly service plans for spring and summer, keeping your yard healthy, clean, and beautiful.
